I am sorry but I don't like this movie, however good it may be. I feel uninvolved with the characters, I can't appreciate how genious this movie is. I expected cinematic art but I can't watch more than an hour. And I can appreciate all other top movies in cinema. This feels like an average one for me. I can't feel the greatness of other movies like it or not.

Then, for the quality, the restored version is as good as it gets, bearing in mind the dark photography and grain from the master, it has good contrast but a low dynamic range. Sound is good and clear.

However subtitles are not in english! Thanks for the upload.
